content.p: Achieve more with our amazing facilities Follow us on LinkedIn Welcome to our sector-leading facilities We've invested millions into our buildings and cutting-edge equipment. We're constantly upgrading our buildings and technology to meet the latest learning, research and workplace needs. “Engineering isn't just sitting in a classroom or listening to lectures, it's hands-on learning. Using facilities like the wind tunnels, building gliders and working on project weeks. Those parts of it are so much fun.” Emma Tardrew – MEng Aerospace Engineering student Our graduates are highly sought after by employers in the UK and internationally, because we teach the technical and professional skills you need to be work-ready. View facilities by subject The exact facilities and equipment you will use depends on your specific course. Facilities include: If you're looking for research facilities with a difference, then the University of Nottingham is right for you. From power electronics and advanced manufacturing, to sustainable energy technology and healthcare technologies - we have three research institutes, eight research centres and 20 research groups. Where appropriate, we also use research facilities for teaching projects - but please note the exact facilities and equipment you will use depends on your specific course.
